name: 3.12 "A Ditch in Time" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who did Vera wish Norm looked more like?
questions.explanation:
Charles Bronson.

	Norm stated that he wished Vera looked a little less like Charles Bronson. Charles Bronson was a movie actor best known for his "Death Wish" movies.

Amanda.

	Amanda was played by Carol Kane. Carol Kane played Simka on "Taxi".

questions.text: How did Diane and her friend know each other?
questions.explanation:
from the mental hospital.

	After Sam and Diane broke up, Diane had a nervous breakdown and was put in the hospital. Amanda was also in the mental hospital because she was rather delusional.

questions.text: Why did Coach say he had the nickname Coach?
options: He was the third base coach for the Red Sox
He once rode in a pumpkin (a la Cinderella).
questions.explanation:
He never flew first class.

	Coach was the third base coach for the Red Sox when Sam Malone pitched for the team. But Coach never put that together with his nickname. His real name was Ernie.

questions.text: How many speeches did Sam have for dumping women?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	Diane accused him of having one speech that he'd used on thousands of women to dump them. Sam said each case was different so he had six speeches.

questions.text: What did Sam have trouble doing?
questions.correct: Breaking up with the girl he was dating
questions.explanation:
Breaking up with the girl he was dating.

	Every time Sam would try to dump Amanda she'd get hysterical. At one point she even offered to get rid of her parents.

questions.text: What did Diane suggest Norm and Vera name their child?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	Norm and Vera weren't even with child yet but because they were trying, they were looking at baby names. The only name he really had a problem with was Cliff.

questions.text: How did Sam get out of going out with the woman he was seeing?
options: He paid her off to go away.
He told her he was fatally ill.
He fixed her up with someone else.
questions.explanation:
He pretended to be dead.

	Diane was very upset with Sam for how he dealt with his problem. He thought it was the perfect solution.

questions.text: Who did Sam say he was when the woman came in after he thought she was gone for good?
questions.explanation:
Ed, Sam's twin brother.

	Sam got caught in his lie so he had to lie again saying he was his twin brother. Sam didn't even have a twin brother, he just had his brother Derek who was older than him.

questions.text: What name did Diane use for Sam when talking about him in group therapy?
questions.explanation:
Ralph.

	When Amanda found out who Sam was she quickly decided she didn't want to be with him. She said she couldn't be held for something she babbled in a bar.
